00039 /* declare number of sub-addresses to framework */
00040 unsigned char idata _n_sub_addr = 1;
00041 
00042 sbit EXT_WATCHDOG = P0 ^ 3;
00043 
00044 /* AD7718 pins */
00045 sbit ADC_SCLK = P1 ^ 6;         // Serial Clock
00046 sbit ADC_DIN  = P1 ^ 7;         // Data in
00047 
00048 sbit AD1_NCS  = P1 ^ 0;         // !Chip select
00049 sbit AD2_NCS  = P1 ^ 1;         // !Chip select
00050 sbit AD3_NCS  = P1 ^ 2;         // !Chip select
00051 sbit AD4_NCS  = P1 ^ 3;         // !Chip select
00052 
00053 sbit AD1_DOUT = P0 ^ 4;         // Data out
00054 sbit AD2_DOUT = P0 ^ 5;         // Data out
00055 sbit AD3_DOUT = P0 ^ 6;         // Data out
00056 sbit AD4_DOUT = P0 ^ 7;         // Data out
00057 
00058 
00059 /* AD7718 registers */
00060 #define REG_STATUS     0
00061 #define REG_MODE       1
00062 #define REG_CONTROL    2
00063 #define REG_FILTER     3
00064 #define REG_ADCDATA    4
00065 #define REG_ADCOFFSET  5
00066 #define REG_ADCGAIN    6
00067 #define REG_IOCONTROL  7

00139 /*---- User init function ------------------------------------------*/
00140 
00141 extern SYS_INFO sys_info;
00142 
00143 void user_init(unsigned char init)
00144 {
00145    unsigned char i;
00146 
00147    AMX0CF = 0x00;               // select single ended analog inputs
00148    ADC0CF = 0xE0;               // 16 system clocks, gain 1
00149    ADC0CN = 0x80;               // enable ADC 
00150    REF0CN = 0x03;               // enable internal reference, BIAS on
00151 
00152    DAC0CN = 0x00;               // disable DAC0
00153    DAC1CN = 0x00;               // disable DAC1
00154 
00155    /* push-pull:
00156       P0.0    TX
00157       P0.1
00158       P0.2
00159       P0.3    
00160 
00161       P0.4    ADC1 in
00162       P0.5    ADC2 in
00163       P0.6    ADC3 in
00164       P0.7    ADC4 in
00165     */
00166    PRT0CF = 0x01;
00167    P0 = 0xFF;
00168 
00169    /* push-pull:
00170       P1.0    ADC1_NCS
00171       P1.1    ADC2_NCS
00172       P1.2    ADC3_NCS
00173       P1.3    ADC4_NCS
00174 
00175       P1.4    
00176       P1.5    
00177       P1.6    ADC_DIN
00178       P1.7    ADC_SCLK
00179     */
00180    PRT1CF = 0xCF;
00181    P1 = 0xFF;
00182 
00183    /* initial EEPROM value */
00184    if (init) {
00185    }
00186 
00187    /* set-up ADC */
00188    for (i=0 ; i<4 ; i++) {
00189       write_adc(i, REG_FILTER, 82);                   // SF value for 50Hz rejection
00190       write_adc(i, REG_MODE, 0x13);                   // continuous conversion, 10 channels
00191       write_adc(i, REG_CONTROL, 0x0F);                // start first conversion
00192    }
00193 }
00194 
00195 #pragma NOAREGS
00196 
00197 /*---- ADC functions -----------------------------------------------*/
00198 
00199 void set_adc_ncs(unsigned char n, unsigned char d)
00200 {
00201    switch (n) {
00202       case 0: AD1_NCS = d; break;
00203       case 1: AD2_NCS = d; break;
00204       case 2: AD3_NCS = d; break;
00205       case 3: AD4_NCS = d; break;
00206    }
00207 }
00208 
00209 unsigned char get_adc_dout(unsigned char n)
00210 {
00211    switch (n) {
00212       case 0: return AD1_DOUT;
00213       case 1: return AD2_DOUT;
00214       case 2: return AD3_DOUT;
00215       case 3: return AD4_DOUT;
00216    }
00217 }
00218 
00219 unsigned char get_adc_nrdy(unsigned char n)
00220 {
00221    unsigned int value;
00222 
00223    switch (n) {
00224       case 0: AMX0SL = 1; break;
00225       case 1: AMX0SL = 0; break;
00226       case 2: AMX0SL = 3; break;
00227       case 3: AMX0SL = 2; break;
00228    }
00229 
00230    ADCINT = 0;
00231    ADBUSY = 1;
00232    while (!ADCINT);
00233 
00234    value = (ADC0L | (ADC0H << 8));
00235    return (value > 2048);
00236 }
00237 
00238 void write_adc(unsigned char n, unsigned char a, unsigned char d)
00239 {
00240    unsigned char i, m;
00241 
00242    /* write to communication register */
00243 
00244    set_adc_ncs(n, 0);
00245    
00246    /* write zeros to !WEN and R/!W */
00247    for (i=0 ; i<4 ; i++) {
00248       ADC_SCLK = 0;
00249       ADC_DIN  = 0;
00250       ADC_SCLK = 1;
00251    }
00252 
00253    /* register address */
00254    for (i=0,m=8 ; i<4 ; i++) {
00255       ADC_SCLK = 0;
00256       ADC_DIN  = (a & m) > 0;
00257       ADC_SCLK = 1;
00258       m >>= 1;
00259    }
00260 
00261    set_adc_ncs(n, 1);
00262 
00263    /* write to selected data register */
00264 
00265    set_adc_ncs(n, 0);
00266 
00267    for (i=0,m=0x80 ; i<8 ; i++) {
00268       ADC_SCLK = 0;
00269       ADC_DIN  = (d & m) > 0;
00270       ADC_SCLK = 1;
00271       m >>= 1;
00272    }
00273 
00274    set_adc_ncs(n, 1);
00275 }
00276 
00277 void read_adc24(unsigned char n, unsigned char a, unsigned long *d)
00278 {
00279    unsigned char i, m;
00280 
00281    /* write to communication register */
00282 
00283    set_adc_ncs(n, 0);
00284    
00285    /* write zero to !WEN and one to R/!W */
00286    for (i=0 ; i<4 ; i++) {
00287       ADC_SCLK = 0;
00288       ADC_DIN  = (i == 1);
00289       ADC_SCLK = 1;
00290    }
00291 
00292    /* register address */
00293    for (i=0,m=8 ; i<4 ; i++) {
00294       ADC_SCLK = 0;
00295       ADC_DIN  = (a & m) > 0;
00296       ADC_SCLK = 1;
00297       m >>= 1;
00298    }
00299 
00300    set_adc_ncs(n, 1);
00301 
00302    /* read from selected data register */
00303 
00304    set_adc_ncs(n, 0);
00305 
00306    for (i=0,*d=0 ; i<24 ; i++) {
00307       *d <<= 1;
00308       ADC_SCLK = 0;
00309       *d |= get_adc_dout(n);
00310       ADC_SCLK = 1;
00311    }
00312 
00313    set_adc_ncs(n, 1);
00314 }
00315 
00316 #ifdef UNIPOLAR
00317 unsigned char code adc_index[] = {14, 15, 4, 5, 2, 3, 0, 1, 6, 7};
00318 #else
00319 unsigned char code adc_index[] = {12, 10, 9, 8, 11};
00320 #endif
00321 
00322 static unsigned char iadc, ichn;
00323 static unsigned long last_check;
00324 
00325 void adc_read()
00326 {
00327    unsigned char i, next, ivalue;
00328    unsigned long value;
00329    float gvalue;
00330 
00331    if (get_adc_nrdy(iadc)) {
00332        if (time() - last_check < 30)
00333           return;
00334       write_adc(iadc, REG_CONTROL, 0x0F); // try to restart ADC
00335    }
00336 
00337    last_check = time();
00338 
00339    read_adc24(iadc, REG_ADCDATA, &value);
00340 
00341 #ifdef UNIPOLAR
00342    ivalue = iadc * 10 + ichn;
00343 #else
00344    ivalue = iadc * 5 + ichn;
00345 #endif
00346 
00347    /* convert to volts */
00348    gvalue = ((float)value / (1l<<24)) * 2.56;
00349 
00350    /* round result to 5 digits */
00351    gvalue = floor(gvalue*1E5+0.5)/1E5;
00352 
00353    DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00354    user_data.adc[ivalue] = gvalue;
00355    ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00356 
00357    /* start next channel on this ADC */
00358    next = ichn+1;
00359 #ifdef UNIPOLAR
00360    if (next == 10)
00361 #else
00362    if (next == 5)
00363 #endif
00364      next = 0;
00365    i = adc_index[next];
00366    write_adc(iadc, REG_CONTROL, (i << 4) | 0x0F); // adc_chn, +2.56V range
00367 
00368    /* switch to next ADC */
00369    iadc++;
00370    if (iadc == 4) {
00371      iadc = 0;
00372      ichn++;
00373 #ifdef UNIPOLAR
00374      if (ichn == 10)
00375 #else
00376      if (ichn == 5)
00377 #endif
00378         ichn = 0;
00379    }
00380 }

00397 /*---- User function called vid CMD_USER command -------------------*/
00398 
00399 unsigned char user_func(unsigned char *data_in, unsigned char *data_out)
00400 {
00401    /* echo input data */
00402    data_out[0] = data_in[0];
00403    data_out[1] = data_in[1];
00404    return 2;
00405 }
00406 
00407 /*---- User loop function ------------------------------------------*/
00408 
00409 void user_loop(void)
00410 {
00411    adc_read();
00412 }
